text: Maria Evangelina "Vange" Leonel Gandolfo (May 4, 1963 – July 14, 2014) was a Brazilian singer-songwriter, journalist, novelist, playwright, feminist and LGBT activist. She was famous for her work with the now-defunct post-punk band Nau. On July 14, 2014, Vange died after a long struggle with ovarian cancer.Morre cantora Vange Leonel aos 51 anos Her body was cremated one day later. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official blog (inactive since 2011) * Category:1963 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:Brazilian singer-songwriters Category:Writers from São Paulo Category:Brazilian activists Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Singers from São Paulo
title: Vange Leonel
